doc:
Dean Fredericks https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dean_Fredericks 0 Dean Fredericks (born Frederick Joseph Foote, January 21, 1924 – died June 30, 1999 in Los Angeles) was an American actor best known for his portrayal of the comic strip character Steve Canyon in a 34-episode television series of the same name which aired from 1958–1959 on NBC. On October 31, 1942, he enlisted as a private in the 1st Cavalry Division of the United States Army and served during World War II. He received a Purple Heart medal. Dean_Fredericks ( born Frederick_Joseph_Foote , January_21_,_1924 – died June_30_,_1999 in Los_Angeles ) was an_American_actor best_known for his_portrayal of the_comic_strip_character_Steve_Canyon in a_34-episode_television_series of the_same_name which aired from 1958 – 1959 on NBC . On October_31_,_1942 , he enlisted as a_private in the_1st_Cavalry_Division of the_United_States_Army and served during World_War_II . He received a_Purple_Heart_medal .
